properties.description: Joining and Aggregating New York City Taxi Data using Wrangling Data Flows

activities.name: Taxi Demo
activities.description: Joining and Aggregating New York City Taxi Data

UserQuery.name: SinkTaxiSink
UserQuery.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkTaxiSink
